title: Put baby bonus back on agenda, urges Costello, as birth rate slides
description: With Australia's fertility rate at a new low and concerns about the economic impact on the future, the ex-treasurer behind the early 2000s baby boom says all options should be on the table to encourage more children.
content:
It became an iconic line that encapsulated a controversial scheme: paying cash to baby-producing families.
"Have one for your husband and one for your wife and one for the country," then treasurer P… [+3512 chars]

raw_data.author: Daniel Ziffer
